trans-unit.target: !!! Windows用户！！！有关安装说明，请参见此处。

trans-unit.source: cocotb is a coroutine based cosimulation library for writing VHDL and Verilog testbenches in Python.
trans-unit.target: cocotb是基于协程的协同仿真库，用于用Python编写VHDL和Verilog测试平台。

trans-unit.source: A C++11 compiler
trans-unit.target: 一个C++11编译器

trans-unit.source: A simple Makefile:
trans-unit.target: 一个简单的Makefile。

trans-unit.source: After installing these dependencies, the latest stable version of cocotb can be installed with pip.
trans-unit.target: 安装完这些依赖项后,可以用pip安装cocotb的最新稳定版。

trans-unit.source: An HDL simulator (such as Icarus Verilog)
trans-unit.target: HDL模拟器（例如Icarus Verilog）

trans-unit.source: An example of a simple randomized cocotb testbench:
trans-unit.target: 一个简单的随机cocotb测试台的例子。

trans-unit.source: As a first trivial introduction to cocotb, the following example "tests" a flip-flop.
trans-unit.target: 作为cocotb的第一个琐碎的介绍,下面的例子 "测试 "了一个翻板。

trans-unit.source: Cocotb based USB 1.1 test suite for FPGA IP, with testbenches for a variety of open source USB cores
trans-unit.target: 基于Cocotb的FPGA IP的USB 1.1测试套件,具有各种开源USB核的测试平台。

trans-unit.source: Cocotb requires:
trans-unit.target: Cocotb要求:

trans-unit.source: Endian Swapper tutorial
trans-unit.target: Endian Swapper教程

trans-unit.source: First, we need a hardware design which we can test. For this example, create a file dff.sv with SystemVerilog code for a simple D flip-flop. You could also use any other language a cocotb-supported simulator understands, e.g. VHDL.
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们需要可以测试的硬件设计。对于此示例，创建一个文件 dff.sv 用一个简单的SystemVerilog代码d触发器。您还可以使用受Cocotb支持的模拟器理解的任何其他语言，例如VHDL。

trans-unit.source: For detail on how to install the development version of cocotb, see the lastest documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何安装cocotb 开发版本的详细信息，请参阅最新文档。

trans-unit.source: For more details on installation, including prerequisites, see the documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有关安装的更多详细信息，包括前提条件，请参阅文档。

trans-unit.source: For more information please see the cocotb documentation and the wiki.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见cocotb文档和Wiki。

trans-unit.source: For more related resources please check the wiki and the list of projects depending on cocotb.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多相关资源，请检查wiki和取决于cocotb的项目列表。

trans-unit.target: Cocotb的功能覆盖和约束随机化扩展

trans-unit.source: cocotb is a coroutine based cosimulation library for writing VHDL and Verilog testbenches in Python.
trans-unit.target: cocotb是一个基于coroutine的cosimulation库,用于在Python中编写VHDL和Verilog测试平台。
